definitions.title: 1. n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: only pl. [[הַגְרִים]] Ps 83:7; [[הַהַגְרִאִים]] 1Ch 5:10, [[הַהַגְרִיאִים]] 1Ch 1Ch 5:19, 1Ch 5:20; a tribe (Aramaean ? Arabian ?) with which the E. Jordan Israelites waged successful war; v. dub. conj. as to identity in Glas:Skizze ii. 407.

definitions.title: 2. adj. gent.
definitions.body: of an officer of David [[יׇזִיז הַהַגְרִי]] 1Ch 27:31.

definitions.title: 3. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: father of one of David's warriors [[בֶּן־הַגְרִי]] 1Ch 11:38 (but ‖ 2Sa 23:36 [[בָּנִי הַגׇּדִי]] so here Öt, cf. Be Th:Sm Dr:Sm).
